tasks.title: Research multi-agent management limitations
tasks.description: Analyze current agent management system to identify why it only supports one agent per codebase instead of concurrent multi-agent management
tasks.completion_notes: Multi-agent management analysis completed. Identified fundamental architectural limitations preventing concurrent multi-agent management. System currently supports only one agent per codebase due to single-task processing bottlenecks.
